sentences.sContent: Then they made a tour of inspection of the whole farm and surveyed with speechless admiration the ploughland, the hayfield, the orchard, the pool, the spinney.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then they made a tour of inspection of the whole farm and surveyed with speechless admiration the ploughland, the hayfield, the orchard, the pool, the spinney.
sentences.sCn: 然后他们又在庄园视察了一周，带着惊叹的神气巡视田地、草地、果园、池塘、灌木林，激动地说不出话。

trans.tranOther: a small area of trees and bushes
